name: Booze Master
storyline:
Tea, juice, cola, soy milk. Everything tastes better with a little booze on top.

I'm Jerry. I just got back from the joint and found my wonderful estate in tatters. My woman doesn't love me anymore, my cousin is still a pain in the nation's healthy body, and the neighbours are driving me crazy with their insect-like racket.

I will fix up this village as good as new and become the richest man within a 10-mile radius. Now, you ask me, "How can I do this?" By turning everything I touch into alcohol.
summary: In Booze Master, you play the role of a brilliant moonshiner. Grow plants, harvest crops, produce alcohol and build your booze empire.
